pageContext.title: I can’t log in to EcoCart with my Google account
pageContext.content:
If you’re using Google to log in to EcoCart, you’ll need to first have third-party cookies enabled. To ensure you can use your Google account to log in to EcoCart, follow these steps.

Google Chrome (PC)

  1. Click the three dots in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
  2. Click Settings.
  3. Scroll down top the “Privacy and security” category and click “Cookies and other site data”

  1. In the “General settings” section, select either “Block third-party cookies in Incognito” or “Allow all cookies”

 

Google Chrome (Mac)

  1. Open Chrome preferences
  2. Navigate to “Privacy and security”

  1. Under Privacy and security, click “Cookies and other site data”
  2. Select either “allow all cookies” or “Block third-party cookies in Incognito”
